Title: Mother's Day
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Jenji Kohan, Piper Kerman (book), Jordan Harrison (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: Caputo's kinder, gentler new regime includes organizing a Mother's Day fair for the inmates that brings up a LOT of mixed feelings about family.
